plugins.name: Section Template Manager
plugins.description:
Section Template Manager streamlines your daily workflow in FigJam by automatically duplicating template sections with today's date. Perfect for teams who use FigJam for daily stand-ups, retrospectives, or any recurring activities.


Key Features:

• One-click duplication - No UI, just instant action

• Automatic dating - New sections are named with today's date (YYYY-MM-DD)

• Smart organization - Existing dated sections automatically shift to maintain chronological order

• Template flexibility - Any section starting with "TEMPLATE" becomes a reusable template


How it works:

1. Create a section with a name starting with "TEMPLATE"

2. Run the plugin

3. Your template is duplicated with today's date, and existing sections are organized


Perfect for:

• Daily KPT (Keep/Problem/Try) retrospectives

• Team stand-up meetings

• Weekly reports and reviews

• Project status tracking

• Any recurring documentation needs


Save time and maintain consistency in your team's documentation workflow. No more manual copying or renaming - let Section Template Manager handle the repetitive tasks so you can focus on what matters.
plugins.tagline: Organize your daily sections with one click

plugins.name: 文案提取与替换 Text Extractor & Replacer
plugins.description:
介绍

文案提取与替换是一款高效实用的 Figma 插件，可快速提取选中元素中的文本，并支持批量修改与一键替换，适用于多语言版本设计、内容本地化与运营迭代场景。


功能说明

  1. 提取选中节点中的全部文本内容
  2. 自动合并重复文案并展示唯一列表
  3. 可逐条输入替换文案
  4. 支持一键替换全部或单条替换
  5. 支持复制原文案、一键恢复初始值
  6. 替换后自动更新当前原文显示


使用方法

  1. 选中一个或多个页面元素
  2. 点击【📋 提取选中文案】，展示全部原文案
  3. 输入对应的替换内容
  4. 点击【替换】按钮应用更改（可单条或全部替换）
  5. 点击【复制】获取原文，或点击【恢复】重填初始内容


注意事项

  1. 插件执行替换前需加载原文字体（已自动处理）
  2. 替换仅影响文本内容，不修改字体样式
  3. 替换基于精确匹配，请确保输入一致
  4. 请在提取前确保已选中有效节点


Introduction

Text Extractor & Replacer is a practical Figma plugin designed to help you quickly extract and batch replace text from selected elements—ideal for multi-language design workflows, localization, and content iteration.


Function Description

  1. Extract all text from selected nodes
  2. Display a unique list of original strings
  3. Edit replacements in a unified interface
  4. One-click replace for individual or all text
  5. Copy original text and restore initial values anytime
  6. Auto-update "original" label after each replacement


How to Use

  1. Select one or more elements in your Figma file
  2. Click 📋 Extract Text to list all unique texts
  3. Input replacement values next to each entry
  4. Click Replace (per-row or globally) to apply changes
  5. Use Copy to copy source text or Restore to revert input


Notes

  1. Font loading is required before text replacement (handled automatically)
  2. This plugin only replaces text values, not font styles
  3. Replacements are based on exact match
  4. Make sure to select nodes before extraction

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quickly extract and replace text in bulk with ease

plugins.name: QR Code Automation
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to update / replace all QR codes in your Figma file with just one click! You have the total control over sizes, and Color!


How to use it:


  1. Create a text layer.
  2. Name the text layer "QR-Link". (You can change the content of this layer at any time — the name should remain "QR-Link".)
  3. Create one or multiple rectangles (squares) and name them "QR-Code".
  4. Create a second text layer
  5. Name the text layer "QR-color", and add the Hex code of the color you want your QR-Code to have inside the text layer.
  6. Run the Plugin


The plugin will generate a QR code using the content from the "QR-Link" text layer. It will place the QR code over each rectangle named "QR-Code" and match the dimensions of the rectangle. If the rectangle is inside a frame, the QR code will be placed inside that frame as well.


If you run the plugin again, the existing QR codes will be replaced with the updated ones.


Hint:

  1. It's not a problem if there are multiple text layers named "QR-Link" — just make sure that all of them contain the exact same text content. Otherwise, the plugin will not run.
  2. It does not matter if you add the Hex-code with or without the #
plugins.tagline: Auto update multiple QR-Codes with one click

plugins.name: push-my-icons
plugins.description:
Push your Figma SVG icons to GitHub with ease.


This plugin helps you

  1. Automatically extract SVG nodes
  2. Upload them to your GitHub repository
  3. Generate a pull request with added/updated/removed icons


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin and fill in the following fields:
  2. GitHub personal access token
  3. GitHub repository URL
  4. Target folder path in the repo (e.g., src/icons)
  5. Pull request title and description
  6. Select all frames that contain your SVG icon components.
  7. Each selected frame should be a top-level container for one or more SVGs.
  8. Click "Push" button.
  9. The plugin will:
  10. Export all SVGs found in the selected frames
  11. Upload them to the specified folder in your GitHub repo
  12. Create a pull request containing added, updated, or deleted icon files
plugins.tagline: Push selected Figma icons to GitHub in one click.

plugins.name: 文本样式导出器 TextStyle Exporter
plugins.description:
介绍

一键提取当前文件中的本地文本样式名称与对应的 key，便于跨文件引用和样式管理。


功能说明

  1. 获取当前 Figma 文件中所有本地文本样式
  2. 显示每个文本样式的名称与唯一 key
  3. 支持一键复制或查看 key，用于开发或样式映射


使用方法

  1. 打开包含本地文本样式的设计文件（建议为团队样式库）
  2. 选中任意节点（或不选中）并运行插件
  3. 点击“获取样式列表”按钮，即可查看所有样式及其 key


注意事项

  1. 插件仅能提取“本地文本样式”，不支持远程团队样式
  2. 请确保文件具有编辑权限，否则无法读取样式
  3. 建议在样式库文件中使用本插件效果最佳


Introduction

Quickly extract all local text style names and their unique keys from your current Figma file — ideal for style management and developer use.


Function Description

  1. Retrieve all local text styles in the current file
  2. Display each text style’s name and corresponding key
  3. Supports easy reference for cross-file usage or developer integration


How to Use

  1. Open the design file containing local text styles (preferably a team library)
  2. Run the plugin — selection is optional
  3. Click the “Fetch Style List” button to display names and keys


Notes

  1. Only local text styles are supported, not team styles from other files
  2. Ensure the file is editable to allow style access
  3. Recommended usage: in a shared style library file for best results

plugins.description:
介绍

【字号缩放工具 (专业版) Font Size Scale (Pro)】是一款高级 Figma 插件，可帮助设计师精确快捷地缩放文本字号，有效提升设计工作效率。


功能说明

本插件提供两种缩放模式：连续缩放与阶梯缩放。连续缩放通过比例调整文本字号，而阶梯缩放则允许按固定数值（例如增加或减少 1、2、3）对字号进行调整。此外，对于包含文本的画板、组或框架，插件还会自动在名称后追加缩放后缀，方便后续管理。


使用方法

1.选择包含文本的图层、画板或组。

2.通过点击不同的 Tab，选择“连续缩放”或“阶梯缩放”。

3.在连续缩放模式下，通过滑块调整缩放比例；在阶梯缩放模式下，通过自定义数字输入控件输入步长数值。

4.点击“应用缩放”按钮来执行操作。

5.请确保所有所需的字体均已加载。


注意事项

•请确保选区中包含文本节点。

•本插件支持单个文本层以及含文本的容器。

•在对大范围设计进行缩放时，请注意可能引起的布局调整。


Introduction

Font Size Scale (Pro) is an advanced Figma plugin for scaling text sizes with precision and ease. It enables designers to update text sizes quickly, streamlining your design workflow.


Function Description

This plugin provides two scaling modes: continuous scaling and step-wise scaling. The continuous mode adjusts font sizes by a ratio, while the step-wise mode increases or decreases font sizes by fixed increments. In addition, any frames or groups that contain text are renamed with a suffix that indicates the applied scale change.


Usage

1.Select the text layers, frames, or groups you wish to scale.

2.Choose the desired scaling mode by clicking on the corresponding tab.

3.For continuous scaling, adjust the scale ratio via the slider; for step-wise scaling, use the custom number input to specify the step value.

4.Click the “Apply Scale” button to perform the scaling operation.

5.Make sure that all necessary fonts are loaded.


Notes

•Ensure that your selection includes text nodes.

•Both standalone text layers and containers that hold text are supported.

•When scaling large designs, review your layout as some adjustments might affect the overall design consistency.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Step-wise font scaling for pro design.

plugins.name: AI Brand Guide
plugins.description:
AI Brand Guide transforms your design files into comprehensive, professional brand guides in seconds. Extract and organize design elements from your Figma files to create beautiful, developer-friendly documentation.


Key Features

  1. Intelligent Design Element Categorization: Automatically organizes your elements into Buttons, Icons, and Other Elements based on naming patterns
  2. Multi-Frame Export: Choose between Single Frame (all sections in one scrollable frame) or Separate Frames (each section in its own dedicated frame)
  3. Color Palette Extraction: Automatically extracts colors from your selection with detailed RGB, HEX, and HSL values
  4. AI-Powered Color Naming: Generate professional, creative names for your color palette with a single click
  5. Color Theory Generation: Create comprehensive color theory documentation including palette overview, color roles, visual qualities, and usage recommendations
  6. Typography Hierarchy System: Extracts and organizes typography into a structured system with Header and Paragraph classifications
  7. Component Documentation: Displays detailed specifications for buttons, icons and other elements including exact dimensions and padding values
  8. Visual Previews: Generates thumbnail previews for all design elements
  9. Form Element Detection: Special handling for contact forms and other form elements with improved display


How It Works

  1. Select your design elements in Figma (frames, components, or entire pages)
  2. Generate your brand guide with a single click
  3. Customize your guide: Rename colors, add color theory, or organize elements
  4. Export to Figma: Choose your preferred layout style and generate a complete brand guide directly in your Figma file


Element Categorization

For best results, use these naming patterns:

  1. Buttons: Include "btn" or "button" in the name (e.g., "btn-primary", "submit-button")
  2. Icons: Include "icn" or "icon" in the name (e.g., "icn-home", "arrow-icon")
  3. Other Elements: Include "element" or "other" in the name (e.g., "card-element", "other-banner")


What's Included in Your Brand Guide

  1. Color Palette: Complete color documentation with visual swatches and color codes
  2. Typography System: Organized type hierarchy with font details and visual examples
  3. Buttons Collection: All button variants with exact dimensions and padding specifications
  4. Icon Library: Organized icon set with dimensions and specifications
  5. Additional Elements: Cards, banners, forms and other UI components with detailed measurements
  6. Color Theory: Optional section providing insights on palette psychology, symbolism and usage


AI Brand Guide helps design teams maintain consistency while giving developers the exact specifications they need to implement designs accurately.
plugins.tagline: Transform designs into comprehensive brand guides with AI-powered color intelligence.

plugins.name: Tinctify
plugins.description:
🌈 Tinctify – Gradient & Palette Editor for Design Systems


“Tinct: To tinge or tint, as with color; hence, figuratively, to imbue.” – The Century Dictionary


Tinctify is a powerful, design-system–ready, color palette editor that lets you craft beautiful, consistent gradients from any base color right inside Figma.


Create structured color palettes with unlimited base colors, each generating smooth, adjustable gradients with 10 stops, labeled from 50 to 900 following the Material Design naming convention (from lightest to darkest).


Tinctify gives you full visual and numeric control over hue, saturation, lightness, and naming — all in an intuitive and powerful interface.


✨ Core Features:


🎨 Palette-Based Gradient Editor

Define base colors and generate 10-step gradients (50–900) per Material Design naming.


🧠 Smart Curve Editor

Precisely control hue, saturation, and lightness with intuitive curve handles and per-channel strength sliders.


🧪 Color Accessibility Simulation

Preview your palette under luminance and various forms of color blindness (protanopia, deuteranopia, tritanopia, etc.).


🔍 Visual Color Picker & Wheel

Fine-tune using RGB, HSL sliders, a color wheel, or triangle. See how colors are placed in relation to each other on the color wheel.


📥 Import/Export with Color Charts

Save your palettes as smart color charts and re-import them across projects — portable and future-proof.


🔗 Figma Variable Integration

Export your palette to a Figma variable collection in one click.



👩‍🎨 Ideal for:


Design systems and token-based color workflows


UI/UX designers needing structured shade scales


Teams who want accessible, flexible color palettes


Designers tired of wrestling with manual gradient building



💵 One-Time Purchase


Buy once — use forever.


No subscriptions. No lock-in. Just powerful color tooling that belongs to you.
plugins.tagline: Perfect your color palette with visual control over every shade and stop

plugins.name: Base64 生成器 Base64 Generator
plugins.description:
介绍

“Base64 生成器”插件可以将选中的 Figma 元素转换为 Base64 编码的图像。您可以预览生成的图像，调整图像的分辨率，并轻松地将 Base64 编码复制到剪贴板。


功能说明

  1. 生成 Base64：将选中的任何 Figma 元素转换为 Base64 编码的图像。
  2. 预览图像：直接在插件界面查看生成的 Base64 图像。
  3. 图像分辨率：使用倍数选择器调整图像的分辨率（如：1x、2x）。
  4. 复制到剪贴板：一键复制生成的 Base64 编码。


使用方法

  1. 选择一个 Figma 元素（图像、矢量或其他图形元素）。
  2. 打开“Base64 生成器”插件。
  3. 选择图像分辨率倍数（如：1x、2x）。
  4. 点击“生成 Base64”按钮，生成 Base64 编码。
  5. 查看生成的图像并将 Base64 编码复制到剪贴板。


注意事项

  1. 仅可见的图层可以转化为 Base64，隐藏的图层将被忽略。
  2. 插件适用于图像和矢量元素。
  3. 请确保图像大小适中，以便更好地生成 Base64 编码并提高性能。


Introduction

The "Base64 Generator" plugin enables you to convert selected Figma elements into Base64-encoded images. You can preview the generated image, adjust its resolution, and easily copy the Base64 code to your clipboard.


Function Description

  1. Generate Base64: Convert any selected Figma element into a Base64-encoded image.
  2. Preview Image: View the Base64 image directly in the plugin interface.
  3. Image Resolution: Adjust the image's resolution using a multiplier (e.g., 1x, 2x).
  4. Copy to Clipboard: Copy the generated Base64 code with a single click.


How to Use

  1. Select a Figma element (image, vector, or other graphic elements).
  2. Open the "Base64 Generator" plugin.
  3. Choose a resolution multiplier (1x, 2x, etc.).
  4. Click "Generate Base64" to generate the Base64 code.
  5. View the generated image and copy the Base64 code to the clipboard.


Precautions

  1. Only visible layers can be converted into Base64. Hidden layers will be ignored.
  2. The plugin is designed for images and vector elements.
  3. Ensure the image size is appropriate for better performance when generating Base64.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Base64 Generator – Easily generate and preview Base64 images

plugins.name: 切图助手(专业版) Slice Export Assistant Pro
plugins.description:
介绍

切图助手(专业版)是为Figma用户设计的一款强大工具，用于简化切图和导出的过程。此插件使您能够轻松管理和导出多个切图，支持自定义命名规则、格式和倍数。


功能说明

  1. 高级切图管理：根据用户定义的规则自动切图并导出资源。
  2. 自定义导出选项：选择PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF或WEBP格式，并可自定义倍数和前缀。
  3. 批量操作：一次性导出多个切图，支持自定义命名规则。
  4. 翻译支持：一键翻译切图名称为英文，支持其他语言。
  5. 用户友好界面：直观易用的界面，方便管理导出设置和切图。
  6. 导出预览：在导出之前预览切图，确保准确无误。
  7. 历史记录与快速访问：保存并快速重用之前的命名规则，便于操作。
  8. 遮罩与加载动画：为用户提供实时反馈，确保更流畅的使用体验。


使用方法

  1. 设置切图规则：在输入框中输入自定义的命名规则。
  2. 选择切图：点击“获取切图”按钮自动检测项目中的切图。
  3. 自定义导出：选择所需的导出格式、倍数和前缀。
  4. 批量导出：点击“下载”按钮批量导出切图至选定格式。
  5. 翻译功能：使用“一键翻译”按钮即时将切图名称从中文翻译成英文。
  6. 全选功能：使用“全选”按钮轻松选择所有切图框。


注意事项

  1. 确保在导出前选择了切图框。
  2. 仅支持的格式（PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF、WEBP）可用于导出。
  3. 翻译功能目前仅支持中文到英文的翻译。


Introduction

Slice Export Assistant Pro is a powerful tool designed for Figma users to streamline the process of slicing and exporting assets. This plugin allows you to easily manage and export multiple slices with customizable naming rules, formats, and scales.


Function Description

  1. Advanced Slice Management: Automatically slice and export assets based on user-defined rules.
  2. Customizable Export Options: Choose formats like PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, or WEBP, with customizable scales and prefixes.
  3. Batch Operations: Export multiple slices in one go with the ability to define custom naming rules.
  4. Translation Support: One-click translation of slice names to English, with support for other languages.
  5. User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive and easy-to-navigate interface to manage export settings and slices.
  6. Export Preview: Preview slices before exporting to ensure accuracy.
  7. History & Quick Access: Save and quickly reuse previous naming rules with an easy-to-use history feature.
  8. Overlay and Loading Animation: Provides real-time feedback with loading overlays and animations for a smoother user experience.


How to Use

  1. Set Up Slicing Rules: Input your custom naming rules in the input field.
  2. Select Slices: Click on the “Get Slices” button to automatically detect slices in your project.
  3. Customize Exports: Choose your desired export format, scale, and prefix.
  4. Batch Export: Click “Download” to batch export your slices in your selected format.
  5. Translation: Use the "Translate" button to instantly translate slice names from Chinese to English.
  6. Full Selection: Use the "Select All" button for easy selection of all slices.


Important Notes

  1. Ensure you select slices before exporting.
  2. Only supported formats (PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, WEBP) can be used for export.
  3. The translation feature supports only Chinese-to-English translations for now.

136450.name: 切图助手(专业版) Slice Export Assistant Pro
136450.description:
介绍

切图助手(专业版)是为Figma用户设计的一款强大工具，用于简化切图和导出的过程。此插件使您能够轻松管理和导出多个切图，支持自定义命名规则、格式和倍数。


功能说明

  1. 高级切图管理：根据用户定义的规则自动切图并导出资源。
  2. 自定义导出选项：选择PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF或WEBP格式，并可自定义倍数和前缀。
  3. 批量操作：一次性导出多个切图，支持自定义命名规则。
  4. 翻译支持：一键翻译切图名称为英文，支持其他语言。
  5. 用户友好界面：直观易用的界面，方便管理导出设置和切图。
  6. 导出预览：在导出之前预览切图，确保准确无误。
  7. 历史记录与快速访问：保存并快速重用之前的命名规则，便于操作。
  8. 遮罩与加载动画：为用户提供实时反馈，确保更流畅的使用体验。


使用方法

  1. 设置切图规则：在输入框中输入自定义的命名规则。
  2. 选择切图：点击“获取切图”按钮自动检测项目中的切图。
  3. 自定义导出：选择所需的导出格式、倍数和前缀。
  4. 批量导出：点击“下载”按钮批量导出切图至选定格式。
  5. 翻译功能：使用“一键翻译”按钮即时将切图名称从中文翻译成英文。
  6. 全选功能：使用“全选”按钮轻松选择所有切图框。


注意事项

  1. 确保在导出前选择了切图框。
  2. 仅支持的格式（PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF、WEBP）可用于导出。
  3. 翻译功能目前仅支持中文到英文的翻译。


Introduction

Slice Export Assistant Pro is a powerful tool designed for Figma users to streamline the process of slicing and exporting assets. This plugin allows you to easily manage and export multiple slices with customizable naming rules, formats, and scales.


Function Description

  1. Advanced Slice Management: Automatically slice and export assets based on user-defined rules.
  2. Customizable Export Options: Choose formats like PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, or WEBP, with customizable scales and prefixes.
  3. Batch Operations: Export multiple slices in one go with the ability to define custom naming rules.
  4. Translation Support: One-click translation of slice names to English, with support for other languages.
  5. User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive and easy-to-navigate interface to manage export settings and slices.
  6. Export Preview: Preview slices before exporting to ensure accuracy.
  7. History & Quick Access: Save and quickly reuse previous naming rules with an easy-to-use history feature.
  8. Overlay and Loading Animation: Provides real-time feedback with loading overlays and animations for a smoother user experience.


How to Use

  1. Set Up Slicing Rules: Input your custom naming rules in the input field.
  2. Select Slices: Click on the “Get Slices” button to automatically detect slices in your project.
  3. Customize Exports: Choose your desired export format, scale, and prefix.
  4. Batch Export: Click “Download” to batch export your slices in your selected format.
  5. Translation: Use the "Translate" button to instantly translate slice names from Chinese to English.
  6. Full Selection: Use the "Select All" button for easy selection of all slices.


Important Notes

  1. Ensure you select slices before exporting.
  2. Only supported formats (PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, WEBP) can be used for export.
  3. The translation feature supports only Chinese-to-English translations for now.

manifest.name: 切图助手(专业版) Slice Export Assistant Pro

136450.release_notes: Update the cover and add a usage demo video
136450.tagline: Slice and Export with Ease — Professional Tool for Designers

Simply select one or more frames in your Figma project and click "Generate" to see the magic. ✨

118146.release_notes:
✨ What's New?
✅ Auto Layout Support – Initials now stay centered automatically.
✅ Fixed Frame Dimensions – Prevents unwanted width/height changes.
✅ Better Component Support – Works inside instances without breaking overrides.
✅ Improved Stroke Handling – Optional white stroke stays inside the frame.
✅ Smarter Initials Replacement – Removes old initials before generating new ones.

🔧 How It Works
- Select a frame (with or without Auto Layout).
- Click "Generate" → Adds random initials, background, and (optional) stroke.
- Frame stays the same size (no unwanted resizing).
- Click "Generate" again → Replaces initials, keeping everything aligned.
118146.tagline: Easily generate stylish initials avatars for selected frames.

plugins.name: 批量组件填充 Batch Component Fill
plugins.description:
Introduction

Batch Component Fill is a highly efficient and user-friendly Figma plugin designed for designers and teams who need to quickly batch-fill component content. It supports data pasting from Excel, auto-layout frames, and highly customizable workflows.


Function Description

  1. Batch Component Fill: Fill text boxes of multiple components at once.
  2. Excel Data Paste: Copy data directly from Excel and paste it into the plugin. The plugin will parse the table and generate corresponding content automatically.
  3. Auto-Layout Support: Generated content is wrapped in an auto-layout frame with adjustable spacing.
  4. Progress Feedback: Provides real-time progress feedback during the filling process.
  5. Text Layer Conflict Detection: If there are conflicting text layer names in the component, the plugin will flag and notify the user.


Usage

  1. Open the plugin "Batch Component Fill" in Figma.
  2. Select a component or instance with text layers.
  3. Paste table data (supports copying from Excel directly into the plugin).
  4. Click "Generate Content" to automatically generate component instances wrapped in an auto-layout frame based on the data.
  5. After generation, you can manually adjust the results if needed.


Notes

  1. Component Selection Requirement: Ensure a component or instance with text layers is selected.
  2. Unique Text Layer Names: Ensure all text layer names in the component are unique to avoid data conflicts.
  3. Excel Data Format: Make sure table data is properly formatted, with each cell corresponding to a text layer in the component.
  4. Auto-Layout Limitations: Generated content is automatically arranged in a vertically oriented auto-layout frame with a default spacing of 50px, which can be adjusted manually.


介绍

批量组件填充插件（Batch Component Fill）是一款高效实用的 Figma 插件，专为需要快速批量填充组件内容的设计师和团队设计。支持从 Excel 表格粘贴数据，快速生成带有自动布局的内容，并支持高度自定义。


功能说明

  1. 批量填充组件内容：支持一次性填充多个组件的文本框内容。
  2. Excel 数据粘贴：直接从 Excel 中复制数据，并粘贴到插件中，自动解析表格数据并生成对应内容。
  3. 自动布局支持：生成的内容自动包裹在自动布局的框架中，间距可自动调整。
  4. 进度条反馈：在填充内容时提供实时进度反馈，提升用户体验。
  5. 文本框冲突检测：如果组件中存在命名冲突的文本框，插件会标记并提示用户修正。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 中打开插件【批量组件填充】。
  2. 选中一个包含文本框的组件或实例。
  3. 粘贴表格数据（支持从 Excel 复制并粘贴到插件）。
  4. 点击【生成内容】，插件会自动根据数据生成组件实例，并包裹在自动布局框架中。
  5. 组件生成后，可手动调整生成结果。


注意事项

  1. 组件选中要求：请确保选中一个包含文本框的组件或实例。
  2. 文本框命名唯一：确保组件中所有文本框命名唯一，避免生成过程中数据冲突。
  3. Excel 数据格式：确保表格数据按行列分割，每个单元格内容对应组件中的一个文本框。
  4. 自动布局限制：生成的内容会自动排列在一个垂直方向的自动布局框架中，间距默认为 50px，可自行调整。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Easily batch-fill Figma components with custom data.

plugins.name: 图层清理大师 Layer Cleaner
plugins.description:
Introduction

Layer Cleaner is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help you efficiently manage your layers. With easy-to-use functions, it allows you to fold layers, clear hidden layers, or do both at once. Clean and organize your workspace for smoother design workflows.


Function Description

  1. Fold Layers: Collapses all layers in the selected elements, including groups, frames, and components.
  2. Clear Hidden Layers: Removes all hidden layers under the selected elements, improving file performance.
  3. Fold and Clear Hidden Layers: Combines both actions—folding all layers and clearing hidden layers—into one simple click.


How to Use

  1. Select the elements you want to work with.
  2. Choose one of the options in the plugin:
  3. Fold Layers to collapse all layers.
  4. Clear Hidden Layers to delete all hidden layers.
  5. Fold and Clear to perform both actions at once.
  6. The plugin will notify you once the action is complete.


Notes

  1. The plugin only affects the selected layers and elements.
  2. Make sure to save your work before using the plugin, as the changes are irreversible.


介绍

图层清理大师是一个强大的 Figma 插件，旨在帮助您高效地管理图层。通过简便易用的功能，它可以帮助您折叠图层、清除隐藏图层，或者同时执行这两个操作。清理并组织您的工作区，让设计流程更加顺畅。


功能说明

  1. 折叠图层：将所选元素中的所有图层折叠，包括组、框架和组件。
  2. 清除隐藏图层：删除所选元素下所有隐藏的图层，提高文件性能。
  3. 折叠并清除隐藏图层：将折叠图层和清除隐藏图层两项操作合并为一键完成。


使用方法

  1. 选择您要操作的元素。
  2. 在插件中选择以下其中一个选项：
  3. 折叠图层：折叠所有图层。
  4. 清除隐藏图层：删除所有隐藏的图层。
  5. 折叠并清除：同时执行折叠图层和清除隐藏图层两个操作。
  6. 操作完成后，插件会发送通知提示。


注意事项

  1. 插件仅对所选的图层和元素进行操作。
  2. 在使用插件前，请确保保存您的工作，因为更改不可撤销。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.name: PDF导出工具 PDF Export Tool
plugins.description:
Introduction

The PDF Export Tool is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help designers effortlessly export selected design elements into high-quality PDF files. Whether exporting a single element or multiple elements, the PDF Export Tool streamlines the conversion process, enhancing your productivity.


Function Description

  1. Multiple Element Export: Export multiple selected design elements at once, with each element automatically generating a separate page in the PDF.
  2. High-Quality Images: Ensures that the exported PDF maintains the original resolution and clarity of your design elements.
  3. Easy Operation: Complete the export process with just a few clicks, eliminating the need for complex settings.
  4. Automatic Naming: The generated PDF file is automatically named “exported_elements.pdf” for easy retrieval and management.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select Elements: In Figma, select one or more design elements you wish to export.
  2. Run the Plugin: Navigate to Plugins > Development > PDF导出工具 PDF Export Tool in the menu bar.
  3. Export PDF: In the plugin window that appears, click the “Export as PDF” button.
  4. Download File: The plugin will automatically generate and download a PDF file containing your selected elements.


Precautions

  1. Compatibility: Ensure that the selected elements support export in PNG format; otherwise, the export may fail.
  2. File Size: Exporting a large number of high-resolution elements may result in a larger PDF file and may take more time to generate.


介绍

PDF导出工具是一款强大的Figma插件，帮助设计师轻松将选中的设计元素导出为高质量的PDF文件。无论是单个元素还是多个元素，PDF导出工具都能快速完成转换，提升工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 多元素导出：一次性导出多个选中的设计元素，每个元素自动生成独立的PDF页面。
  2. 高质量图像：导出的PDF文件保持设计元素的原始分辨率和清晰度。
  3. 简便操作：只需几步点击，即可完成导出过程，无需复杂设置。
  4. 自动命名：生成的PDF文件自动命名为“exported_elements.pdf”，方便查找和管理。


使用方法

  1. 选择元素：在Figma中，选中一个或多个你想要导出的设计元素。
  2. 运行插件：转到菜单栏的 Plugins > Development > PDF导出工具 PDF Export Tool。
  3. 导出PDF：在弹出的插件窗口中，点击 “导出为 PDF” 按钮。
  4. 下载文件：插件将自动生成并下载包含选中元素的PDF文件。


注意事项

  1. 兼容性：确保所选元素支持导出为PNG格式，否则导出可能失败。
  2. 文件大小：导出大量高分辨率元素时，生成的PDF文件可能会较大，导出过程可能需要更多时间。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung

plugins.tagline: Quickly Export Your Designs to PDF

  1. 兼容性：确保所选元素支持导出为PNG格式，否则导出可能失败。
  2. 文件大小：导出大量高分辨率元素时，生成的PDF文件可能会较大，导出过程可能需要更多时间。

plugins.name: 色值转换器 Color Format Converter
plugins.description:
Introduction

"Color Format Converter" is a lightweight Figma plugin that simplifies viewing, converting, and copying all colors (including child elements) within your selected objects. It supports multiple color formats—Hex, RGB, HSL, HSB, UIColor—and enhances your workflow efficiency.


Function Description

  1. Extract all color information (solid fills, gradients, strokes, and text colors) from the selected layers and their children.
  2. Display colors in various formats: Hex (with alpha), RGB(A), HSL(A), HSB(A), UIColor.
  3. Parallel display of a stable column (Hex+Opacity) and a convertible format column. The stable column remains fixed, while the convertible format can be switched from a dropdown.
  4. Click the convertible format value to copy it, with a success notification appearing in Figma.


Usage

  1. Install and run the plugin in Figma.
  2. Select any object (including groups or components). The plugin automatically extracts all related colors.
  3. Use the dropdown in the plugin panel to change the displayed convertible color format.
  4. Click on a convertible format value to copy it and receive a success notification.


Notes

  1. Ensure a secure context (HTTPS) for direct clipboard API usage. A fallback method is employed otherwise.
  2. If no color is present in the selection, the plugin will display an empty list.


介绍

"颜值转换器 Color Format Converter" 是一款轻量级 Figma 插件，可轻松查看、转换并复制所选对象（含子元素）中的所有颜色信息。支持多种颜色格式（Hex、RGB、HSL、HSB、UIColor），提升你的设计工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 提取选中图层及其子元素的所有颜色信息（纯色、渐变、描边、文本颜色）。
  2. 多种颜色格式展示：Hex（含透明度）、RGB(A)、HSL(A)、HSB(A)、UIColor。
  3. 同时显示稳定格式列（Hex+透明度）和可变格式列，稳定列固定，而可变格式列可通过下拉框切换。
  4. 点击可变格式列的颜色值即可复制，并在 Figma 中显示复制成功提示。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 中安装并运行插件。
  2. 选中任意对象（包括包含子元素的组、组件），插件将自动提取所有颜色。
  3. 使用插件面板中的下拉菜单切换可变格式列的显示格式。
  4. 点击可变格式列的颜色值即可复制，并在 Figma 中获得成功通知。


注意事项

  1. 若需使用剪贴板 API，请确保在安全上下文（HTTPS）下运行，否则将使用后备复制方法。
  2. 如果选中的对象没有任何颜色，插件将显示空列表。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Convert and explore colors in multiple formats.

plugins.name: Resonote - Share and Collaborate
plugins.description:
Overview

Ever found a stakeholder wandering your file looking for a design? Or having to share the same link number of times to get some feedback. With this plugin you can create a dedicated collaborative space with a sharable link for a specific design within your file. Within this space you can easily collect feedback and log actions. Here's an example of the collaborative space.


How to use

  1. First locate the design frame you want create a dedicated space for, it can be a single design or multiple designs within a frame.
  2. Then within the plugin add a name for the design project and the iteration you're adding with a quick description - it could be a feedback request or annotations for the design.
  3. Finally choose the format you want to upload the frame to the dedicated space, it can either be an image or embedded Figma frame.
  4. After you upload the frame to the dedicated space the link will be generated below, if you want to add to the same project after, use the same link and choose 'add to project'.


Example use cases

  1. Tracking design iterations and collecting feedback from the team and stakeholder, with each new iteration including how the feedback was actioned and how the design evolved.
  2. Showcasing different states of design evolution (crawl, walk, run) for stakeholders in a easily sharable link tracking related feedback.
  3. Using iterations for different parts of the designs and tracking related feedback in one space to see how the overall design evolves.


Note

  1. When uploading as an image will make the selected frame or section content public, use at own risk or switch to embed to retain existing file access settings.
  2. Plugin and collaborative feedback space is currently in alpha stage, things will evolve and any feedback or suggestion are more then welcome!
plugins.tagline: Create and share a feedback space to collaborate with your team and stakeholders

plugins.name: WCAG 色彩对比检查 WCAG Color Checker
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin helps you evaluate the contrast ratio between text and background colors in your design frames, ensuring they meet WCAG accessibility standards. Perfect for designers aiming to improve readability and accessibility.


Function Introduction

•Check text-background contrast ratio within selected frames.

•Evaluate contrast according to WCAG standards (AAA, AA, A, Fail).

•Visualize contrast results and interact with your design directly.

•Automatic identification and highlighting of areas needing improvement.


Usage

1.Select a frame in your Figma file.

2.Run the plugin and click “Check Contrast.”

3.Review the results, which are sorted by contrast ratio.

4.Click on any result to highlight and improve specific text elements.


Notes

•Ensure text layers are properly named for better result identification.

•The plugin currently supports checking text against solid color backgrounds only.

•For best results, use the plugin on well-structured design frames.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件帮助您评估设计画板中文本与背景颜色之间的对比度，以确保其符合 WCAG 无障碍设计标准。非常适合希望提升可读性和无障碍性的设计师。


功能说明

•检查选定画板中文本与背景的对比度。

•根据 WCAG 标准评估对比度（AAA、AA、A、Fail）。

•可视化对比度结果并直接与设计交互。

•自动识别和突出显示需要改进的区域。


使用方法

1.在 Figma 文件中选择一个画板。

2.运行插件并点击“检查对比度”。

3.查看按对比度排序的结果。

4.点击任一结果以突出并改进特定的文本元素。


注意事项

•确保文本图层正确命名，以便更好地识别结果。

•插件目前仅支持检查与纯色背景的文本对比。

•为获得最佳效果，请在结构良好的设计画板上使用插件。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quickly check and improve contrast ratios in Figma frames with one click.

plugins.name: BartTextToDesignNow
plugins.description:
I’m excited to share a new Figma plugin I’ve been working on. It’s still in the early stages, but the idea is simple and powerful: you can describe what you want to see, and the plugin will draw it for you. I’m really thankful for any support or feedback you can offer as I continue to develop it.


At the moment, the plugin is focused on basic shapes. For example, you could type, "Draw a rectangle, 450 width, 600 height, 45 stroke size, red stroke color, yellow fill color," and the plugin will generate that exact shape on your canvas. The key is to keep your instructions straightforward and precise.


To help you along the way, the plugin provides helpful hints at the bottom of the screen as you type your commands. This should make it easier to craft the right instruction and get the results you’re looking for.


If you make a mistake or want to adjust something, you can use the "Previous" command to go back to the last command you entered. This allows you to easily refine your design without starting from scratch.


This plugin is just getting started, so your feedback and support are crucial as I continue to improve and add more features. Thank you for trying it out!

plugins.name: SheetSync For DeSo
plugins.description:
SheetSync For DeSo: Google Sheets to Figma Design Variations


SheetSync is a powerful Figma plugin that creates design variations directly from your Google Sheets data, saving you hours of repetitive work. Perfect for generating product catalogs, social media posts, campaign assets, and more.


With SheetSync, simply select a template frame, connect your Google Sheet, and watch as the plugin automatically generates variations with customized text and images. Text fields with "#" prefixes automatically populate from your sheet's columns, while image placeholders update with URLs from your data.


Key Features:

• Generate dozens of design variations in seconds

• Dynamic text population from spreadsheet data

• Automatic image placement from URL sources

• Simple template setup with intuitive naming conventions

• Manual image upload option for greater flexibility


Streamline your design workflow and ensure consistency across all your variations with SheetSync For DeSo.

plugins.name: 文本样式映射助手 TextStyle Mapper
plugins.description:
介绍

本插件可帮助你在 Figma 中快捷地将选中元素的本地文本样式进行批量替换，无需手动一个个设置，提升效率，适用于多语言或版本样式替换场景。


功能说明

  1. 自动获取当前文件的本地文本样式
  2. 提供源样式与目标样式下拉选择
  3. 批量替换所选文本节点的样式
  4. 无本地样式时自动提示空状态


使用方法

  1. 打开插件后，插件会自动加载本地文本样式；
  2. 从两个下拉框中分别选择「源样式」与「目标样式」；
  3. 选中需要替换样式的文本节点，点击「开始替换」按钮；
  4. 替换完成后插件自动关闭。


注意事项

  1. 本插件仅支持本地文本样式替换，不支持团队样式库；
  2. 请确保当前文件中已有本地样式，否则将显示空状态；
  3. 请先选中需替换的文本图层再操作。


Introduction

This plugin helps you batch replace local text styles in Figma with just a few clicks. It's ideal for managing multilingual design systems or switching between style versions efficiently.


Function Description

  1. Automatically loads all local text styles from the current file
  2. Provides dropdowns to select source and target styles
  3. Replaces text styles for selected text nodes in bulk
  4. Shows an empty state message if no local styles exist


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin to load local text styles automatically;
  2. Select the source and target styles from the dropdowns;
  3. Select the text nodes you want to modify;
  4. Click the “Replace” button to apply the change.


Notes

  1. Only local text styles are supported (no team styles);
  2. The plugin will show an empty state if no local styles exist;
  3. Make sure to select text layers before using the plugin.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Batch replace local text styles with ease
